# National Hydrography Dataset 

nhdplusTools package
https://doi-usgs.github.io/nhdplusTools/

in NHDplus "catchment" = polygon feature that captures the drainage divide areound the hydrologic unit that contributes surface flow to a given NHD flowline

COMID id's catchment polygon, flowline that connects catchment inlet and outlet, & value added attributres

Scope of data used
* Flowlines and waterbodies: 1-d streams and 1-d "artificial waterbodies"
* Catchment polygons
* Network attributes from NHDplus

Web and local (mix of services)
